author: yongbinfeng
body:
The DeepMET was added to CMSSW from CMSSW_11_1_0_pre8, 

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29764/

with the modification to cms-data

https://github.com/cms-data/RecoMET-METPUSubtraction/pull/5

and cms-dist

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/5826

Now we would like to backport this change so DeepMET could be running with CMSSW_10_6_X: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30612

@steggema  @intrepid42
title: update RecoMET-METPUSubtraction data for backport DeepMET into CMSSW_10_6_X
